title: SliceSemOcc: Vertical Slice Based Multimodal 3D Semantic Occupancy Representation
summary: This paper introduces SliceSemOcc for 3D semantic occupancy prediction, leveraging a complete 3D voxel grid to model spatial structures and capture semantic variations along the vertical axis.
